name: Insync
description: Put on your tapping shoes and get ready to shake a leg, for the next iteration of the much-awaited dance event of Pravega is back! Lasya 2022 presents InSync to mesmerise, energise and rejuvenate your soul. IIScians! We bring you the biggest platform to showcase your hidden dancing talent. Be ready to display your crazy moves to the world

modules.heading: Eligibility
modules.content:
Open to all.
First 50 registrations will get free TIAAN products worth 50k! Hurry!

modules.heading: Submissions
modules.content: The process is simple enough: just pick a song of your choice and make a fiery dance-music video of minimum 90 seconds and send them to us at pravega.lasya@gmail.com. Post it in your insta account while collaborating with lasya_iisc.22 for judging. If you don't know how to collaborate in instagram posts, see this video. If you don't have an insta account, contact us at our mail ID and we'll post it for you

modules.heading: Prizes
modules.content: 1600 for the best team and 400 for best individual
